```{r}
KnnSelecting <- function(signals, dists, dist_method = "euclidean", k = 20, noise = 0) {
  stopifnot(noise < k)
  if(is(dists, "dist")) {
    knn1 <- dbscan::kNN(dists, k = k)
    knn2 <- apply(knn1$id, 2, function(x) x %in% which(attr(dists, "Labels") %in% grep("^Noise", rownames(knn1$id), value = TRUE)))
  } else {
    knn1 <- dbscan::kNN(dists[[dist_method]], k = k)
    knn2 <- apply(knn1$id, 2, function(x) x %in% which(attr(dists[[dist_method]], "Labels") %in% grep("^Noise", rownames(knn1$id), value = TRUE)))
  }
  
  tu <- row.names(knn1$id)[which(rowSums(knn2) <= noise)]
  # tu <- union(tu, knn2[which(rowSums(knn2) <= noise), 1])
  tu <- grep("^Noise", tu, invert = TRUE, value = TRUE)
  ggplot(signals, aes(x = Blockade, y = DwellTime, colour = !ID %in% tu)) + 
    geom_point(size = .5) + 
    scale_y_log10() + 
    scale_colour_manual(values = c("#E41A1C", "#377EB8")) + 
    theme_classic() + 
    theme(legend.position = "none") -> p1
  ggplot(signals[ID %in% tu], aes(x = Blockade, y = DwellTime, colour = ID %in% tu)) + 
    geom_point(size = .5) + 
    scale_y_log10() + 
    scale_colour_manual(values = "#E41A1C") + 
    theme_classic() + 
    theme(legend.position = "none") + 
    labs(title = length(tu)) -> p2
  ggplot(signals[!ID %in% tu], aes(x = Blockade, y = DwellTime, colour = ID %in% tu)) + 
    geom_point(size = .5) + 
    scale_y_log10() + 
    scale_colour_manual(values = "#377EB8") + 
    theme_classic() + 
    theme(legend.position = "none") -> p3
  print(p1 + p2 + p3)
  return(tu)
}

RemoveOutlier1 <- function(tree, n = 10, o = NULL) {
  k <- ceiling(length(res.hc$labels)/100)
  res_ct <- stats::cutree(res.hc, k = k)
  while (sum(table(res_ct) >= n) == 1) {
    k <- k + 1
    res_ct <- stats::cutree(res.hc, k = k)
  }
  if(is.null(o)) o <- n
  names(res_ct[res_ct %in% names(which(table(res_ct) >= o))])
}
RemoveOutlier <- function(tree, n = 10, Keep = 0.95) {
  h <- length(tree$height)
  g <- cutree(tree, h = tree$height[h])
  g <- data.table(tip = names(g), cluster = g)
  
  while (g[, .N, cluster][N >= n, sum(N)/length(tree$labels)] > Keep) {
    h <- h - 1
    g <- cutree(tree, h = tree$height[h])
    g <- data.table(tip = names(g), cluster = g)
  }
  cat(paste0("Keep: ", round(g[, .N, cluster][N >= n, sum(N)/length(tree$labels)] * 100, 2), "%"))
  g[cluster %in% g[, .N, cluster][N >= n, cluster], tip]
}

get_density <- function(x, y, n = 1000, ...) {
  dens <- MASS::kde2d(x, y, n = n, ...)
  ix <- findInterval(x, dens$x)
  iy <- findInterval(y, dens$y)
  ii <- cbind(ix, iy)
  return(dens$z[ii] / max(dens$z[ii]))
}

Peaks <- function(x, y) {
  stopifnot(length(x) == length(y))
  uR <- IRanges(diff(y) >= 0)
  dR <- IRanges(diff(y) <= 0)
  res <- do.call(c, lapply(seq_along(uR), function(i) {
    reduce(c(uR[i], dR[i]))
  }))
  
  Ps <- mapply(seq_along(res), FUN = function(i) {
    x[start(res[i]):end(res[i])][which.max(y[start(res[i]):end(res[i])])]
  })
  Py <- mapply(seq_along(res), FUN = function(i) {
    max(y[start(res[i]):end(res[i])])
  })
  res <- data.table(x = Ps, xmin = x[start(res)], xmax = x[end(res)], y = Py)
  attr(res, "peaks") <- Ps
  return(res)
}

densityPeak <- function(x, bw = 0.01, peaks = 2, n = 1024, from = 0, to = 1, plot = T, ...) {
  den <- density(x, bw = bw, n = n, ...)
  ps <- Peaks(den$x, den$y)
  dx <- attr(ps, "peaks")
  dy <- den$y[den$x %in% attr(ps, "peaks")]
  dy <- dy/max(dy)
  
  dx2 <- dx[dx <= dx[which.max(dy)]]
  dy2 <- dy[dx <= dx[which.max(dy)]]
  
  dx2 <- dx2[dy2 %in% head(sort(dy2, decreasing = T), peaks)]
  dy2 <- dy2[dy2 %in% head(sort(dy2, decreasing = T), peaks)]
  res <- sort(dx2, decreasing = T)
  df <- mean(abs(diff(den$y)))
  CI <- mapply(res, FUN = function(i) {
    from <- with(den, x[x < i])[max(start(IRanges(diff(with(den, y[x < i])) > mean(abs(diff(with(den, y[x < i])))))))]
    to <- with(den, x[x > i])[min(end(IRanges(diff(with(den, y[x > i])) < mean(abs(diff(with(den, y[x > i])))))))]
    min(c(i - from, to - i))
  })
  attr(res, "CI") <- CI
  if(plot) {
    plot(den)
    abline(v = res, lty = 2, col = 2)
    abline(v = res - attr(res,"CI"), lty = 2, col = 3)
    abline(v = res + attr(res,"CI"), lty = 2, col = 3)
  } else {
    return(res)
  }
}

MainRidge <- function(x, bw = 0.001, bwstep = 0.0005, n = 1024, peaks = 2, mingap = 0.05, CI = 0.99, plot = T, ...) {
  den <- density(x, bw = bw, n = n, ...)
  ps <- Peaks(den$x, den$y)
  res <- ps[order(y, decreasing = T)][seq_len(peaks)]
  if(peaks > 1) {
    while (min(res[, diff(sort(x))]) < mingap) {
      bw <- bw + bwstep
      den <- density(x, bw = bw, n = n, ...)
      ps <- Peaks(den$x, den$y)
      res <- ps[order(y, decreasing = T)][seq_len(peaks)]
    }
  }
  
  if(CI < 1) {
    new_x <- lapply(seq_len(nrow(res)), function(i) {
      resy <- with(den, y[x > res[i, xmin] & x < res[i, xmax]])
      resy <- resy > max(resy) * (1 - CI) + min(resy)
      resx <- range(with(den, x[x > res[i, xmin] & x < res[i, xmax]])[resy])
      resx
    })
    new_x <- do.call(rbind, new_x)
    res$xmin <- new_x[, 1]
    res$xmax <- new_x[, 2]
  }
  res$ratio <- mapply(function(i) mean(x >= res$xmin[i] & x <= res$xmax[i]), seq_len(nrow(res)))
  
  if(plot) {
    plot(den)
    abline(v = res[, x], lty = 2, col = 2)
    abline(v = res[, xmin], lty = 2, col = 3)
    abline(v = res[, xmax], lty = 2, col = 3)
  } else {
    return(res)
  }
}
```

```{r fig.width=24, fig.height=6}
aat <- "Asn"
bgsignal <- fread(paste0("./analysis/82.ABFProcessing/SelectedSignals/", aat, "_background.txt"))
bgsignal[, file_id := as.character(file_id)]

bgsignal[, ID := paste0("Noise_", ID)]

dataset <- fread(paste0("./analysis/82.ABFProcessing/SelectedSignals/", aat, "_signal.txt"))
dataset[, file_id := as.character(file_id)]
dataset[, File := gsub("\\.[0-9]", "", file_id)]
dataset[, ID := paste0(aat, "_", ID)]

FeatureMatrix <- paste0("./analysis/82.ABFProcessing/FeatureMatrix/FeatureMatrix_", unique(dataset$File), ".txt")
FeatureMatrix <- do.call(rbind, lapply(FeatureMatrix, fread))
FeatureMatrix[, ID := paste0(aat, "_", ID)]
FeatureMatrix <- FeatureMatrix[ID %in% dataset[, ID]]
FeatureMatrix[, AA := aat]
setkey(FeatureMatrix, ID)
FeatureMatrix <- FeatureMatrix[dataset$ID, ]
FeatureMatrix <- data.frame(FeatureMatrix[, grepl("^X", colnames(FeatureMatrix)) | grepl("DwellTime", colnames(FeatureMatrix)), with = F], row.names = FeatureMatrix[[1]])

LineMat <- melt.data.table(as.data.table(FeatureMatrix, keep.rownames = "ID"), id.vars = "ID")[variable != "DwellTime"]
LineMat[, x := as.numeric(gsub("^X", "", variable))]

sigs <- KnnSelecting(signals = dataset, dists = alldists, k = 10, noise = 0)
```

```{r fig.width=24, fig.height=6}
aat <- "Asp"
bgsignal <- fread(paste0("./analysis/82.ABFProcessing/SelectedSignals/", aat, "_background.txt"))
bgsignal[, file_id := as.character(file_id)]
bgsignal[, File := gsub("\\.[0-9]", "", file_id)]
bgsignal[, ID := paste0("Noise_", ID)]

dataset <- fread(paste0("./analysis/82.ABFProcessing/SelectedSignals/", aat, "_signal.txt"))

dataset[, File := gsub("\\.[0-9]", "", file_id)]
dataset[, ID := paste0(aat, "_", ID)]

FeatureMatrix <- paste0("./analysis/82.ABFProcessing/FeatureMatrix/FeatureMatrix_", unique(dataset$File), ".txt")
FeatureMatrix <- do.call(rbind, lapply(FeatureMatrix, fread))
FeatureMatrix[, ID := paste0(aat, "_", ID)]
FeatureMatrix <- FeatureMatrix[ID %in% dataset[, ID]]
FeatureMatrix[, AA := aat]
setkey(FeatureMatrix, ID)
FeatureMatrix <- FeatureMatrix[dataset$ID, ]
FeatureMatrix <- data.frame(FeatureMatrix[, grepl("^X", colnames(FeatureMatrix)) | grepl("DwellTime", colnames(FeatureMatrix)), with = F], row.names = FeatureMatrix[[1]])

LineMat <- melt.data.table(as.data.table(FeatureMatrix, keep.rownames = "ID"), id.vars = "ID")[variable != "DwellTime"]

sigs <- KnnSelecting(signals = dataset, dists = alldists, k = 10, noise = 0)
```

```{r}
den <- density(SignalCurrent_Sig[, Current], from = 0, to = 1, bw = 0.001, n = 1000)
```

```{r}
ij <- 0.001
ps <- MainRidge(x = SignalCurrent_Sig[, Current], plot = F, peaks = 2, bw = ij)
db <- max(apply(data.table(x = ps[, xmax - x], y = ps[, x - xmin]), 1, function(x) max(x)/min(x)))
while (db > 3 | min(ps[, xmax - xmin]) < 0.06) {
  ij <- ij + 0.0001
  ps <- MainRidge(x = SignalCurrent_Sig[, Current], plot = F, peaks = 2, bw = ij)
  db <- max(apply(data.table(x = ps[, xmax - x], y = ps[, x - xmin]), 1, function(x) max(x)/min(x)))
}
MainRidge(x = SignalCurrent_Sig[, Current], plot = T, peaks = 2, bw = ij)

ps <- ps[order(x, decreasing = T)]
ps$L <- paste0("State", seq_len(nrow(ps)))
ps[, B := round(1 - x, 3)]
```

```{r}
S12 <- SignalCurrent_Sig[, .(TouchL2 = mean(Current <= ps[L == "State2", xmax]), 
                             L1Ratio = mean(inrange(Current, ps[L == "State1", xmin], ps[L == "State1", xmax])), 
                             L2Ratio = mean(inrange(Current, ps[L == "State2", xmin], ps[L == "State2", xmax]))), ID]
S12[, State := ifelse(L2Ratio >= L1Ratio, "Mixtrue", "Sington")]
MainRidges <- merge(S12, MainRidges[, .(ID, MainPeak = ratio)], by = "ID")
dataset_summa <- merge(dataset, MainRidges, by = "ID")
S12[, .N, State]
```

```{r}
ij <- 0.001
ps <- MainRidge(x = SignalCurrent_Sig[, Current], plot = F, peaks = 3, bw = ij)
db <- max(apply(data.table(x = ps[, xmax - x], y = ps[, x - xmin]), 1, function(x) max(x)/min(x)))
while (db > 3 | min(ps[, xmax - xmin]) < 0.06) {
  ij <- ij + 0.0001
  ps <- MainRidge(x = SignalCurrent_Sig[, Current], plot = F, peaks = 3, bw = ij)
  db <- max(apply(data.table(x = ps[, xmax - x], y = ps[, x - xmin]), 1, function(x) max(x)/min(x)))
}
MainRidge(x = SignalCurrent_Sig[, Current], plot = T, peaks = 3, bw = ij)

ps <- ps[order(x, decreasing = T)][1:2, ]
ps$L <- paste0("State", seq_len(nrow(ps)))
ps[, B := round(1 - x, 3)]
```

```{r}
S12 <- SignalCurrent_Sig[, .(TouchL2 = mean(Current <= ps[L == "State2", xmax]), 
                             L1Ratio = mean(inrange(Current, ps[L == "State1", xmin], ps[L == "State1", xmax])), 
                             L2Ratio = mean(inrange(Current, ps[L == "State2", xmin], ps[L == "State2", xmax]))), ID]
S12[, State := ifelse(L2Ratio >= L1Ratio, "Mixtrue", "Sington")]
MainRidges <- merge(S12, MainRidges[, .(ID, MainPeak = ratio)], by = "ID")
dataset_summa <- merge(dataset, MainRidges, by = "ID")
S12[, .N, State]
```

```{r}
ij <- 0.001

}

ps[, B := round(1 - x, 3)]
```

```{r fig.width=24, fig.height=6}
aat <- "Gln"
bgsignal <- fread(paste0("./analysis/82.ABFProcessing/SelectedSignals/", aat, "_background.txt"))
bgsignal[, file_id := as.character(file_id)]
bgsignal[, File := gsub("\\.[0-9]", "", file_id)]
bgsignal[, ID := paste0("Noise_", ID)]

dataset <- fread(paste0("./analysis/82.ABFProcessing/SelectedSignals/", aat, "_signal.txt"))
dataset[, file_id := as.character(file_id)]
dataset[, File := gsub("\\.[0-9]", "", file_id)]
dataset[, ID := paste0(aat, "_", ID)]

FeatureMatrix <- paste0("./analysis/82.ABFProcessing/FeatureMatrix/FeatureMatrix_", unique(dataset$File), ".txt")
FeatureMatrix <- do.call(rbind, lapply(FeatureMatrix, fread))
FeatureMatrix[, ID := paste0(aat, "_", ID)]
FeatureMatrix <- FeatureMatrix[ID %in% dataset[, ID]]
FeatureMatrix[, AA := aat]
setkey(FeatureMatrix, ID)
FeatureMatrix <- FeatureMatrix[dataset$ID, ]
FeatureMatrix <- data.frame(FeatureMatrix[, grepl("^X", colnames(FeatureMatrix)) | grepl("DwellTime", colnames(FeatureMatrix)), with = F], row.names = FeatureMatrix[[1]])

LineMat <- melt.data.table(as.data.table(FeatureMatrix, keep.rownames = "ID"), id.vars = "ID")[variable != "DwellTime"]
LineMat[, x := as.numeric(gsub("^X", "", variable))]
LineMat[, Blockade := 1 - x/1000]
LineMat <- LineMat[, .SD[, .(alpha = value/sum(value), Blockade)], ID]

alldists <- readRDS(file.path("./analysis/82.ABFProcessing/SelectedSignals/01.StandardAA/01.SignalDistance", paste0(aat, ".signal.dist.Rds")))
sigs <- KnnSelecting(signals = dataset, dists = alldists, k = 10, noise = 0)
```

```{r}
ij <- 0.001
ps <- MainRidge(x = SignalCurrent_Sig[, Current], plot = F, peaks = 2, bw = ij)
db <- max(apply(data.table(x = ps[, xmax - x], y = ps[, x - xmin]), 1, function(x) max(x)/min(x)))
while (db > 3 | min(ps[, xmax - xmin]) < 0.06) {
  ij <- ij + 0.0001
  ps <- MainRidge(x = SignalCurrent_Sig[, Current], plot = F, peaks = 2, bw = ij)
  db <- max(apply(data.table(x = ps[, xmax - x], y = ps[, x - xmin]), 1, function(x) max(x)/min(x)))
}
MainRidge(x = SignalCurrent_Sig[, Current], plot = T, peaks = 2, bw = ij)

ps <- ps[order(x, decreasing = T)]
ps$L <- paste0("State", seq_len(nrow(ps)))
ps[, B := round(1 - x, 3)]
```

```{r}
S12 <- SignalCurrent_Sig[, .(TouchL2 = mean(Current <= ps[L == "State2", xmax]), 
                             L1Ratio = mean(inrange(Current, ps[L == "State1", xmin], ps[L == "State1", xmax])), 
                             L2Ratio = mean(inrange(Current, ps[L == "State2", xmin], ps[L == "State2", xmax]))), ID]
S12[, State := ifelse(L2Ratio >= L1Ratio, "Mixtrue", "Sington")]
MainRidges <- merge(S12, MainRidges[, .(ID, MainPeak = ratio)], by = "ID")
dataset_summa <- merge(dataset, MainRidges, by = "ID")
S12[, .N, State]
```

```{r}
ij <- 0.001
ps <- MainRidge(x = SignalCurrent_Sig[, Current], plot = F, peaks = 2, bw = ij)
db <- max(apply(data.table(x = ps[, xmax - x], y = ps[, x - xmin]), 1, function(x) max(x)/min(x)))
while (db > 3 | min(ps[, xmax - xmin]) < 0.06) {
  ij <- ij + 0.0001
  ps <- MainRidge(x = SignalCurrent_Sig[, Current], plot = F, peaks = 2, bw = ij)
  db <- max(apply(data.table(x = ps[, xmax - x], y = ps[, x - xmin]), 1, function(x) max(x)/min(x)))
}
MainRidge(x = SignalCurrent_Sig[, Current], plot = T, peaks = 2, bw = ij)

ps <- ps[order(x, decreasing = T)]
ps$L <- paste0("State", seq_len(nrow(ps)))
ps[, B := round(1 - x, 3)]
```

```{r}
S12 <- SignalCurrent_Sig[, .(TouchL2 = mean(Current <= ps[L == "State2", xmax]), 
                             L1Ratio = mean(inrange(Current, ps[L == "State1", xmin], ps[L == "State1", xmax])), 
                             L2Ratio = mean(inrange(Current, ps[L == "State2", xmin], ps[L == "State2", xmax]))), ID]
S12[, State := ifelse(L2Ratio >= L1Ratio, "Mixtrue", "Sington")]
MainRidges <- merge(S12, MainRidges[, .(ID, MainPeak = ratio)], by = "ID")
dataset_summa <- merge(dataset, MainRidges, by = "ID")
S12[, .N, State]
```

```{r fig.width=24, fig.height=6}
aat <- "Phe"
bgsignal <- fread(paste0("./analysis/82.ABFProcessing/SelectedSignals/", aat, "_background.txt"))
bgsignal[, file_id := as.character(file_id)]
bgsignal[, File := gsub("\\.[0-9]", "", file_id)]
bgsignal[, ID := paste0("Noise_", ID)]

dataset <- fread(paste0("./analysis/82.ABFProcessing/SelectedSignals/", aat, "_signal.txt"))
dataset[, file_id := as.character(file_id)]
dataset[, File := gsub("\\.[0-9]", "", file_id)]
dataset[, ID := paste0(aat, "_", ID)]

FeatureMatrix <- paste0("./analysis/82.ABFProcessing/FeatureMatrix/FeatureMatrix_", unique(dataset$File), ".txt")
FeatureMatrix <- do.call(rbind, lapply(FeatureMatrix, fread))
FeatureMatrix[, ID := paste0(aat, "_", ID)]
FeatureMatrix <- FeatureMatrix[ID %in% dataset[, ID]]
FeatureMatrix[, AA := aat]
setkey(FeatureMatrix, ID)
FeatureMatrix <- FeatureMatrix[dataset$ID, ]
FeatureMatrix <- data.frame(FeatureMatrix[, grepl("^X", colnames(FeatureMatrix)) | grepl("DwellTime", colnames(FeatureMatrix)), with = F], row.names = FeatureMatrix[[1]])

LineMat <- melt.data.table(as.data.table(FeatureMatrix, keep.rownames = "ID"), id.vars = "ID")[variable != "DwellTime"]
LineMat[, x := as.numeric(gsub("^X", "", variable))]
LineMat[, Blockade := 1 - x/1000]
LineMat <- LineMat[, .SD[, .(alpha = value/sum(value), Blockade)], ID]

alldists <- readRDS(file.path("./analysis/82.ABFProcessing/SelectedSignals/01.StandardAA/01.SignalDistance", paste0(aat, ".signal.dist.Rds")))
sigs <- KnnSelecting(signals = dataset, dists = alldists, k = 10, noise = 0)
```

```{r}
den <- density(SignalCurrent_Sig[, Current], from = 0, to = 1, bw = 0.001, n = 1000)
den <- with(den, data.table(x, y))
hist <- hist(SignalCurrent_Sig[, Current], breaks = 1000, plot = F)
den$y <- den$y/max(den$y)*max(hist$counts)
```

```{r}
ij <- 0.001
ps <- MainRidge(x = SignalCurrent_Sig[, Current], plot = F, peaks = 2, bw = ij)
db <- max(apply(data.table(x = ps[, xmax - x], y = ps[, x - xmin]), 1, function(x) max(x)/min(x)))
while (db > 3 | min(ps[, xmax - xmin]) < 0.06) {
  ij <- ij + 0.0001
  ps <- MainRidge(x = SignalCurrent_Sig[, Current], plot = F, peaks = 2, bw = ij)
  db <- max(apply(data.table(x = ps[, xmax - x], y = ps[, x - xmin]), 1, function(x) max(x)/min(x)))
}
MainRidge(x = SignalCurrent_Sig[, Current], plot = T, peaks = 2, bw = ij)

ps <- ps[order(x, decreasing = T)]
ps$L <- paste0("State", seq_len(nrow(ps)))
ps[, B := round(1 - x, 3)]
```

```{r}
S12 <- SignalCurrent_Sig[, .(TouchL2 = mean(Current <= ps[L == "State2", xmax]), 
                             L1Ratio = mean(inrange(Current, ps[L == "State1", xmin], ps[L == "State1", xmax])), 
                             L2Ratio = mean(inrange(Current, ps[L == "State2", xmin], ps[L == "State2", xmax]))), ID]
S12[, State := ifelse(L2Ratio >= L1Ratio, "Mixtrue", "Sington")]
MainRidges <- merge(S12, MainRidges[, .(ID, MainPeak = ratio)], by = "ID")
dataset_summa <- merge(dataset, MainRidges, by = "ID")
S12[, .N, State]
```


```{r}
ij <- 0.001
ps <- MainRidge(x = SignalCurrent_Sig[, Current], plot = F, peaks = 2, bw = ij)
db <- max(apply(data.table(x = ps[, xmax - x], y = ps[, x - xmin]), 1, function(x) max(x)/min(x)))
while (db > 3 | min(ps[, xmax - xmin]) < 0.06) {
  ij <- ij + 0.0001
  ps <- MainRidge(x = SignalCurrent_Sig[, Current], plot = F, peaks = 2, bw = ij)
  db <- max(apply(data.table(x = ps[, xmax - x], y = ps[, x - xmin]), 1, function(x) max(x)/min(x)))
}
MainRidge(x = SignalCurrent_Sig[, Current], plot = T, peaks = 2, bw = ij)

ps <- ps[order(x, decreasing = T)]
ps$L <- paste0("State", seq_len(nrow(ps)))
ps[, B := round(1 - x, 3)]
```

```{r}
S12 <- SignalCurrent_Sig[, .(TouchL2 = mean(Current <= ps[L == "State2", xmax]), 
                             L1Ratio = mean(inrange(Current, ps[L == "State1", xmin], ps[L == "State1", xmax])), 
                             L2Ratio = mean(inrange(Current, ps[L == "State2", xmin], ps[L == "State2", xmax]))), ID]
S12[, State := ifelse(L2Ratio >= L1Ratio, "Mixtrue", "Sington")]
MainRidges <- merge(S12, MainRidges[, .(ID, MainPeak = ratio)], by = "ID")
dataset_summa <- merge(dataset, MainRidges, by = "ID")
S12[, .N, State]
```

```{r fig.width=24, fig.height=6}
aat <- "Trp"
bgsignal <- fread(paste0("./analysis/82.ABFProcessing/SelectedSignals/", aat, "_background.txt"))

FeatureMatrix <- paste0("./analysis/82.ABFProcessing/FeatureMatrix/FeatureMatrix_", unique(dataset$File), ".txt")

FeatureMatrix[, AA := aat]
setkey(FeatureMatrix, ID)
FeatureMatrix <- FeatureMatrix[dataset$ID, ]
FeatureMatrix <- data.frame(FeatureMatrix[, grepl("^X", colnames(FeatureMatrix)) | grepl("DwellTime", colnames(FeatureMatrix)), with = F], row.names = FeatureMatrix[[1]])
```

```{r fig.width=24, fig.height=6}
aat <- "Tyr"
bgsignal <- fread(paste0("./analysis/82.ABFProcessing/SelectedSignals/", aat, "_background.txt"))
```

```{r}
den <- density(SignalCurrent_Sig[, Current], from = 0, to = 1, bw = 0.001, n = 1000)
den <- with(den, data.table(x, y))
hist <- hist(SignalCurrent_Sig[, Current], breaks = 1000, plot = F)
den$y <- den$y/max(den$y)*max(hist$counts)
```

```{r}
ij <- 0.001
ps <- MainRidge(x = SignalCurrent_Sig[, Current], plot = F, peaks = 2, bw = ij)
db <- max(apply(data.table(x = ps[, xmax - x], y = ps[, x - xmin]), 1, function(x) max(x)/min(x)))
while (db > 3 | min(ps[, xmax - xmin]) < 0.06) {
  ij <- ij + 0.0001
  ps <- MainRidge(x = SignalCurrent_Sig[, Current], plot = F, peaks = 2, bw = ij)
  db <- max(apply(data.table(x = ps[, xmax - x], y = ps[, x - xmin]), 1, function(x) max(x)/min(x)))
}
MainRidge(x = SignalCurrent_Sig[, Current], plot = T, peaks = 2, bw = ij)

ps <- ps[order(x, decreasing = T)]
ps$L <- paste0("State", seq_len(nrow(ps)))
ps[, B := round(1 - x, 3)]
```

```{r}
S12 <- SignalCurrent_Sig[, .(TouchL2 = mean(Current <= ps[L == "State2", xmax]), 
                             L1Ratio = mean(inrange(Current, ps[L == "State1", xmin], ps[L == "State1", xmax])), 
                             L2Ratio = mean(inrange(Current, ps[L == "State2", xmin], ps[L == "State2", xmax]))), ID]
S12[, State := ifelse(L2Ratio >= L1Ratio, "Mixtrue", "Sington")]
MainRidges <- merge(S12, MainRidges[, .(ID, MainPeak = ratio)], by = "ID")
dataset_summa <- merge(dataset, MainRidges, by = "ID")
S12[, .N, State]
```

```{r}
ij <- 0.001
ps <- MainRidge(x = SignalCurrent_Sig[, Current], plot = F, peaks = 2, bw = ij)
db <- max(apply(data.table(x = ps[, xmax - x], y = ps[, x - xmin]), 1, function(x) max(x)/min(x)))
while (db > 3 | min(ps[, xmax - xmin]) < 0.06) {
  ij <- ij + 0.0001
  ps <- MainRidge(x = SignalCurrent_Sig[, Current], plot = F, peaks = 2, bw = ij)
  db <- max(apply(data.table(x = ps[, xmax - x], y = ps[, x - xmin]), 1, function(x) max(x)/min(x)))
}
MainRidge(x = SignalCurrent_Sig[, Current], plot = T, peaks = 2, bw = ij)

ps <- ps[order(x, decreasing = T)]
ps$L <- paste0("State", seq_len(nrow(ps)))
ps[, B := round(1 - x, 3)]
```

```{r}
S12 <- SignalCurrent_Sig[, .(TouchL2 = mean(Current <= ps[L == "State2", xmax]), 
                             L1Ratio = mean(inrange(Current, ps[L == "State1", xmin], ps[L == "State1", xmax])), 
                             L2Ratio = mean(inrange(Current, ps[L == "State2", xmin], ps[L == "State2", xmax]))), ID]
S12[, State := ifelse(L2Ratio >= L1Ratio, "Mixtrue", "Sington")]
MainRidges <- merge(S12, MainRidges[, .(ID, MainPeak = ratio)], by = "ID")
dataset_summa <- merge(dataset, MainRidges, by = "ID")
S12[, .N, State]
```

```{r fig.height=2, fig.width=7}
MainRidges <- SignalCurrent_Sig[, MainRidge(x = Current, bw = 0.005, peaks = 1, CI = 0.99, plot = F), ID]
```

```{r}
ij <- 0.001
ps <- MainRidge(x = SignalCurrent_Sig[, Current], plot = F, peaks = 2, bw = ij)
db <- max(apply(data.table(x = ps[, xmax - x], y = ps[, x - xmin]), 1, function(x) max(x)/min(x)))
while (db > 3 | min(ps[, xmax - xmin]) < 0.06) {
  ij <- ij + 0.0001
  ps <- MainRidge(x = SignalCurrent_Sig[, Current], plot = F, peaks = 2, bw = ij)
  db <- max(apply(data.table(x = ps[, xmax - x], y = ps[, x - xmin]), 1, function(x) max(x)/min(x)))
}
MainRidge(x = SignalCurrent_Sig[, Current], plot = T, peaks = 2, bw = ij)

ps <- ps[order(x, decreasing = T)]
ps$L <- paste0("State", seq_len(nrow(ps)))
ps[, B := round(1 - x, 3)]
```

```{r}
S12 <- SignalCurrent_Sig[, .(TouchL2 = mean(Current <= ps[L == "State2", xmax]), 
                             L1Ratio = mean(inrange(Current, ps[L == "State1", xmin], ps[L == "State1", xmax])), 
                             L2Ratio = mean(inrange(Current, ps[L == "State2", xmin], ps[L == "State2", xmax]))), ID]
S12[, State := ifelse(L2Ratio >= L1Ratio, "Mixtrue", "Sington")]
MainRidges <- merge(S12, MainRidges[, .(ID, MainPeak = ratio)], by = "ID")
dataset_summa <- merge(dataset, MainRidges, by = "ID")
S12[, .N, State]
```
